ai-patthana19.13:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in SN 45.)
ai-patthana19.13:1.1_0: And the cause of the reason why the teachings that has arisen in you.
ai-patthana19.13:1.1_1: And it’s not the cause or condition that gives rise to confidence.
ai-patthana19.13:1.1_2: And they don’t arise because of arisen people.
ai-patthana19.13:2.1_0: There are three supports for seven reasons: faith, preference, oral tradition, seven things come to be. Afterwards there are real things before.
